attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since the introduction of digital tv the analogue reception has deteriorated to a level where it is not possible to watch tv, and yet digital is also unwatchable as even a small amount of interference makes the sound cut out and the picture freeze. I partition that the 4 main channels bb1, bbc2 and itv1 and channel 4 have streams online in which you have to log in with your tv licence number to watch it.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
